posts.title: java NIO学习
posts.text: //示例： try { RandomAccessFile randomAccessFile = new RandomAccessFile(“D://log4j222222.log”,”rw”); FileChannel fileChannel = randomAccessFile.getChannel();//获取通道 ByteBuffer byteBuffer = ByteBuffer.allocate(100);//一次读取的数据大小 int byteRead = fileChannel.read(byteBuffer);//读取数据到buff while(byteRead!=-1){ byteBuffer.flip();//反转buff 写模式切换到读模式 while(byteBuffer.hasRemaining()){//从buff读取数据 System.out.print((char) byteBuffer.get()); } System.out.println(“———-“); byteBuffer.clear();//读取完毕 清理buff byteRead = fileChannel.read(byteBuffer);//重新读取 } randomAccessFile.close(); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
